duties_responsibilities.duty: Engage clients with a consultative approach, providing product suggestions and driving sales.
Build strong client loyalty and drive sales through the hospitality mentality.
Identify opportunities to upsell products and services, and provide credibility to clients through product knowledge and beauty trends.
Demonstrate products and their application to inspire clients and drive sales.
Ensure visual elements of the shop meet brand standards and support merchandising and omni processing as needed.
Learn and expand knowledge in the beauty industry through required training and continuous curiosity.

education_certification.credential: 3+ years of Client facing retail or service industry experience
